statements: SELECT * FROM access_control_policies;
SELECT id, device_id, role_id, permission FROM access_control_policies WHERE role_id = 1;
SELECT permission, device_id, id, role_id FROM access_control_policies WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT id, device_id, role_id, permission FROM access_control_policies WHERE device_id = 2 AND permission = 'read';
SELECT id, permission, device_id, role_id FROM access_control_policies WHERE role_id = 3 ORDER BY permission DESC;
SELECT * FROM access_control_policies WHERE device_id = 1 AND role_id = 2
SELECT id, device_id, role_id, permission FROM access_control_policies WHERE permission = 'read' ORDER BY device_id DESC
SELECT device_id, MAX(role_id) AS max_role FROM access_control_policies GROUP BY device_id HAVING max_role > 2
SELECT * FROM access_control_policies WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) OR permission LIKE '%write%' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_policies FROM access_control_policies WHERE role_id = 3
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE owner_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Access_Control_Policies ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_name, owner_name, access_level FROM IoT_devices WHERE location = 'Living Room';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM IoT_devices;
SELECT * FROM IoT devices WHERE access_level > 2 ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE access_level = 3 AND location = 'Room A';
SELECT owner_name, permission FROM Access_Control_Policies WHERE role = 'Admin' AND permission = 'READ';
SELECT * FROM IoT_devices INNER JOIN Access_Control_Policies ON IoT_devices.id = Access_Control_Policies.device_id;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_name, location FROM IoT_devices WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM device;
SELECT device_id, device_name FROM device WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device WHERE owner_id = 2 ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device WHERE owner_id = 1 AND device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM device WHERE device_type = 'Mobile';
SELECT device_id, device_name, device_type FROM device INNER JOIN access_control ON device.device_id = access_control.device_id WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM user_roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%Admin%';
SELECT * FROM access_control_policy;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM access_control_policy WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, device_name, manufacturer FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'router';
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM access_control_policy WHERE device_id = 1;
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Samsung';
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 3;
SELECT role_name, description FROM roles WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM access_control_policy ORDER BY device_id DESC, user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM device;
SELECT id, name, status FROM device WHERE status = 'online';
SELECT username, email FROM user ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT name, description FROM role WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM device WHERE id = 1;
SELECT name, status FROM device WHERE status = 'online';
SELECT description FROM device WHERE description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username FROM user WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_role WHERE role_id = 2;
